benchmark_details.name: PixelProse
benchmark_details.overview: PixelProse is a comprehensive dataset of over 16M synthetically generated captions, leveraging vision-language models for detailed and accurate descriptions of images, addressing the weaknesses of existing alt-text datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To serve as a high-quality dataset for training vision-language models by providing detailed image captions.

data.source: The dataset is sourced from three different web-scraped databases: CommonPool, CC12M, and RedCaps, comprising images and captions.
data.annotation: Automatically generated captions using vision-language models.

methodology.calculation: Captions generated using Google Gemini 1.0 Pro Vision Model with a focus on detailed descriptions and aesthetic scoring.
methodology.interpretation: PixelProse captions average 506 characters, and toxicity levels are significantly lower compared to original captions.
methodology.validation: Manual verification of generated captions against image content.

harm: Inclusion of biased or toxic content in training data

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: PII redaction steps are integrated into the data processing pipeline.
